page.title: SirNukes texts
page.t: Removes the animation and associated delay for top menus opening
Stops the one-time help text popups from displaying
Globally increases the font size of tooltips (originally 9 pt)
Sets the alpha value of the map menu; egosoft default is 98, set to 100 to remove transparency
Forces the property-owned map to open focused on the player location always, instead of the current target location
When the property-owned map is opened, forces the initial camera distance; 0 is no change (default behavior), 1 is full zoom in, 100 is full zoom out
For UI elements which end up truncating their text, this attempts to add a mouseover popup with the full text; may not work in all cases
Change the density of mass traffic civilian ships around stations. Updates the game config.xml. May require reloading the save to take full effect.
Automatically pauses the game upon loading a save. (The normal unpause button will not work; open and close the options menu to unpause.)
